titles.title: When We All Get To Heaven

authors.author: Eliza E. Hewitt Emily D. Wilson

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
When we all
get to heaven,
What a day of rejoicing
that will be!

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
When we all
see Jesus,
We'll sing and shout
the victory.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Sing the wondrous
love of Jesus,
Sing His mercy
and His grace;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
In the mansions
bright and blessed
He'll prepare
for us a place.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
While we walk
the pilgrim pathway
Clouds will overspread
the sky;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
But when traveling days
are over
Not a shadow,
not a sigh.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Let us then
be true and faithful,
Trusting, serving
every day;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Just one glimpse
of Him in glory
Will the toils
of life repay.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Onward to the prize
before us!
Soon His beauty
we'll behold;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Soon the pearly gates
will open -
We shall tread
the streets of gold.
